Summary: personally witnessed the last 3 minutes of lights. saw red and white flashing. from my driveway to treetops on horizon were1 inch apart.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hayesville
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: sighting detailsmy wife and mother in law pulled in the driveway and discovered the lights. wife says 2 red lights with a white line between them. she pointed north over trees. mother-in-law witnessed same event. they watched it for 15-20 minutes. said there was no sound. i got a call at 11:18 pm saying come see this. from my driveway through the trees the lights were 2-2.5" apart when i held my hand up in front of me. only reference i could think of. 3 minutes later it was close to treetops on the horizon and i measured 1\2 to 1 inch on my finger. when i saw the lights i only ever saw flashing or strobing. wife and mom in law saw solid light and flashing\strobing lights. i heard no sound while outside watching this. they saw more than i did and said they heard nothing the entire time. if looking at a map of hayesville imagine the lights coming down hwy 69 near the state line then moving east towards the clay county rec park. it seemed slow moving while i watched. we do have aircraft fly overhead here normally. but this was different. i will keep my eyes peeled tomorrow and will have camera ready.
